body.name: Spürbar Smart Watches for Women Men (Answer/Make Calls) 1.8 Inch Built-in Alexa. Heart Rate/Blood Oxygen/Sleep Monitor, IP68 Waterproof, 100+ Sport Modes, Bluetooth Smart Watches for iPhone/Android

Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 8 hrs 8 mins
features: Stay Connected and Stylish: Spürbar smartwatch that can call and text and receive messages, you can seamlessly stay in touch while on the go. The smart watch for android ios phones also features Alexa voice functionality, allowing you to conveniently access information and perform tasks with just your voice. It's the perfect smartwatch for men and women who value both fashion and functionality.

All-day health tracking: Take control of your health and fitness goals with fitness tracker watch. It offers advanced health monitoring features, including heart rate tracking, blood oxygen level monitoring, and sleep monitoring. With support for 100+ indoor and outdoor sports modes, such as basketball, yoga, running, and cycling, you can easily track your workout progress and stay motivated. Keep track of your exercise data and make reasonable suggestions.It's the ultimate companion for active individuals.

1.8” Touch Screen and DIY Watch Face: Enjoy a sleek and modern design with this smart watch for women. The 1.8-inch full-touch screen provides a crisp display and intuitive navigation. Customize your watch face with a variety of cloud-based wallpapers to match your style and mood. It's a seamless blend of fashion and technology.

IP68 Waterproof and Long Battery Life: Waterproof watches for men women are made of IP68 rated waterproof material. Can still be worn in the shower and while swimming. 300 mAh battery capacity, Charges in less than two hours and the long battery life ensures that you can use the watch for up to 7 days on a single charge, with a standby time of up to 30 days. Say goodbye to frequent charging and focus on enjoying your day.

Compatibility and More Features: Smart watches for women android iphone compatible with iOS9.0+ and Android6.0+ devices, offering seamless connectivity via Bluetooth. It's packed with a range of features including alarm clock, music playback control, check weather forecast, pedometer, etc. Stay organized, informed, and weather Forecast. It's the perfect companion for all your daily activities.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Affordable price and long lasting battery
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I am happy with the watch , I like the affordable price and the features are working acceptably. It doesn’t have replaying text messages ability, it has a low memory capacity but overall it’s a good watch. Its band has a good quality! Sleep tracking feature and work out tracking works acceptable. Answering incoming call works as well!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great smart phone
reviews.reviewText: Looking for a less expensive smart watch and this watch was perfect. Easy to use, great battery life and had all the main fitness tracking and call making (with Bluetooth connection) functions. It also looks stylish and sturdy/well made.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Fitness Tracker
reviews.reviewText: This fitness tracker has all of the elements of anything you want to track and more. I've only had for a week so far, so this is a limited perspective review. I am still learning all of the functions there are so many things you can do.Likes: The size and ease of use. You can use the app to determine what you want to have visible on the watch. I like being able to use Alexa (no service required), set alarms, see weather, read text messages, know who's calling, monitor my heart rate, monitor my stress level, and take timeout for deep breathing sessions.Uncertainties: the accuracy of the fitness tracker (calories and steps). The battery lasted about 3 days before I needed to charge it. The more features used might be the reason the battery drains faster (not sure, but will continue to monitor)Dislikes: the connection is lost from phone to watch from time to time. The sleep monitor is definitely not accurate. I was up one night and it recorded I was sleep for 9 hrs, but I was awake.I will provide an update after 90 days once I learn how to use more features.

reviews.reviewerName: Michael J. Gratis, Sr.Michael J. Gratis, Sr.
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best $20 I've Spent In A LONG Time!
reviews.reviewText: Let me start off by saying that I owned a Fossil Sport Watch for a few years, before one of the charging bands fell of the back it and it to be a real pain to charge reliably. While this isn't a WearOS watch, I decided to give it a try and see how it compared - For only $19.99, how could I go wrong? Well, let me tell you, with the exception of it not being a WearOS watch, this Spürbar Smart Watch ticks all the right boxes and performs flawlessly! Correct time always shown, fitness info readily available and easily updated, reliably always shows my emails, messages, phones calls, and usual Google Android notifications, including sounds to get your attention. I can even deal with phone calls through the watch! Honestly, this is a heck of a lot of features for the price! I've been using it every day for at least 4 days now, and the battery life is at 73%. I like the charging cable, as it provides a positive, strong magnetic connection. It also connects with the VeryFit app without any issues, and then are many options available in the app, including additional watch faces, which seem to be added to on a regular basis. Highly recommended, if this is the kind of thing your're looking for and you don't want to spend an arm and a leg.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Got this for my hubby to monitor his O2 sats. Took a bit to set up with the app and Bluetooth on his phone. When he drives his truck, the vehicle Bluetooth takes over. Disconnects from the watch and has to be reattached each time. Ugh. Otherwise it is wonderful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Half of the functions did not work
reviews.reviewText: After doing everything by the book, it showed that Alexa was connected but half the time it showed that the connection was lost. All she said to me when I asked her a question ("Alexa what time is it?") was, "I don't know that". There was no way to reset the activity functions so if I didn't make 10,000 steps in one day, it picked up where it left off the next day. I downloaded selected contacts, but it only showed a few favorites. There was a keyboard to enter phone numbers manually, but who knows them? It did display the time, and I did get notifications when I got texts and emails. My husband was able to call me and I could answer it and talk to him. This little trinket was returned.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this watch!
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a decent smart watch to track my progress and this watch is the one! I’ve used other smartwatches in the past and I can honestly say this by far the most comfortable, easy to use, and inexpensive watch. The screen in the watch it's the perfect size and it’s really easy to use. It tracks my exact steps, amount of calories burned, and best for last- the amazing battery!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for the money
reviews.reviewText: Easy to set up and use, great price for a nice smartwatc
